guide.introduction: Polymorph is an amazing material to use, but I do not like it for final projects because of its white color. If you don't know what you're doing, it can be hard to change its color, but with the right technique, it is very simple.
guide.introduction_rendered:
Polymorph is an amazing material to use, but I do not like it for final projects because of its white color. If you don't know what you're doing, it can be hard to change its color, but with the right technique, it is very simple.

Relevant parts
  • Polymorph
  • Ballpoint pen
Tools
  • Exacto Knife
  • Heat gun or hair dryer
  • Latex gloves
  • Needle Nose Pliers
  • Plastic Cup

lines.text: Pour boiling water into the plastic cup and add 1/3 of the polymorph you want to dye.
